author: sboag
msg: Minor tweaking of calls to nextNode().

author: sboag
msg: In getElementById, if the id does not yield an element, call nextNode()
until either the id does yield an element, or nextNode() returns

author: sboag
msg: Check for return of doParse to see if it's an exception, and, if it is
call clearCoRoutine and throw the exception.

author: sboag
msg: Call clearCoRoutine in the release method.

author: sboag
msg: Call mgr.release, so that the manager can call clearCoRoutine on
